name: Hierocoin
description: "Hierocoin $BAR is a community token on the Binance Smart Chain branded after the music group Hieroglyphics. $BAR is also the currency of the Hierocoin DAO for incubating artistic projects. The Hierocoin DAO offers a decentralized platform for artists to build projects. If 51% of the community approve a members proposal it's funded in $BAR. Buying $BAR supports the build of the Hierocoin DAO for funding the arts. $BAR can also be used in Hiero's own metaverse, hierovr.com. In Hierovr.com $BAR holders can access exclusive events and unique metaverse experiences. Learn more at hieroglyphics.com"
